ComicInfo.Summary: Corrie's mother (from issue 1) sees a therapist to try and understand her daughter's suicide. Meanwhile, the chat rooms are on fire with talk of Spawn. The Rev. Gary Danes has his own problems as Spawn appears to him and shows him what life would be like had he been born into any of the groups he so despises. This journey from death to torturous death drives Danes insane, and he ends up mopping floors in a place where the blacks seem to look down on him, but yet are far kinder and more sympathetic toward Danes than he would ever have been towards them.
ComicInfo.Title: Hate You
